messages.welcomeMessage:
GET OUT

Developed by Bruno Ortiz
A game based on the text adventure Zork

Use the HELP command to learn how to play
Note: You may find it useful to draw a map as you go.

--------------------------------------------------

You find yourself in an unfamiliar place, uncertain of where you are or how you got there.
You can see a door on the southern side of the room and hear some noises coming from the other side.

rooms.name: Garden
rooms.description: A fairly small garden with beautiful roses.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A very clean, but fairly empty kitchen.

rooms.name: Empty Room
rooms.description: An empty room with nothing special in it.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: A nice office with fancy looking wooden walls.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A room with a long dining table in the middle.

rooms.name: Main Hall
rooms.description: A big hall without much to see in it.

rooms.name: Trophy Room
rooms.description: A room that contains prizes and trophies on the walls.

exits.name: Garden TO Storage Room
exits.lockedDescription: The MAN standing in front of the door pushes you away.

exits.name: Garden TO Tool Shed
exits.description: A wooden door covered in moss

exits.name: Garden TO Empty Room
exits.description: A wooden door with small glass panels on the top half

exits.name: Tool Shed TO Garden
exits.description: A wooden door covered in moss

exits.name: Empty Room TO Garden
exits.description: A wooden door with small glass panels on the top half
exits.lockedDescription: When you approach the door a big RAT is lured by the light from your flashlight and tries to bite you, so you step back.

exits.name: Office TO Trophy Room
exits.lockedDescription: The door is locked by a LATCH

exits.name: Dining Room TO Kitchen
exits.lockedDescription: The door is blocked by a big angry DOG.

exits.name: Main Hall TO Empty Room
exits.lockedDescription:
The door is locked.
There is a blue electronic screen next to the door displaying the word 'Closed'.

exits.name: Main Hall TO END
exits.lockedDescription: There is something keeping the door shut.

exits.name: Trophy Room TO Office
exits.lockedDescription: The door is locked from the other side.

interactables.name: CABINET
interactables.description: A metal CABINET hangs from the wall
interactables.inspectDescription: The CABINET doors are closed.

interactables.name: CABINET
interactables.description: A metal CABINET hangs from the wall
interactables.inspectDescription: The CABINET doors are opened.

interactables.name: MAN
interactables.description: An old MAN stands in from of the western exit
interactables.inspectDescription: The MAN doesn't seem to be going anywhere.

interactables.name: MAN
interactables.description: The old MAN is still standing in front of the door
interactables.inspectDescription: The MAN is trying to clear the flour from his eyes.

interactables.name: MAN
interactables.description: An old MAN lying on the ground
interactables.inspectDescription: The MAN seems to be unconscious.

interactables.name: CUPBOARD
interactables.description: A large CUPBOARD with glass doors
interactables.inspectDescription: The CUPBOARD doors are closed shut but you can see a FLASHLIGHT and a bag of FLOUR inside.

interactables.name: CUPBOARD
interactables.description: A large CUPBOARD with broken glass doors
interactables.inspectDescription: The CUPBOARD doors are still closed but the glass panes are broken.

interactables.name: DRAWERS
interactables.description: A group of DRAWERS next to the sink
interactables.inspectDescription: The DRAWERS are closed.

interactables.name: DRAWERS
interactables.description: A group of DRAWERS next to the sink
interactables.inspectDescription: The DRAWERS are closed.

interactables.name: RAT
interactables.description: A big RAT rests next to the northern door.
interactables.inspectDescription: The RAT doesn't look very friendly.

interactables.name: LATCH
interactables.description: A LATCH keeping the southern door locked

interactables.name: LATCH
interactables.description: An opened LATCH

interactables.name: DRAWER
interactables.description: A DRAWER that is very slightly opened but stuck
interactables.inspectDescription: You can see something shiny inside the DRAWER

interactables.name: DRAWER
interactables.description: An opened DRAWER
interactables.inspectDescription: The DRAWER edge is slightly damaged.

interactables.name: DOG
interactables.description: A big angry DOG stands in front of the north door
interactables.inspectDescription: The DOG seems to be really, really angry.

interactables.name: DOG
interactables.description: A big happy DOG lies down next to the north door
interactables.inspectDescription: The DOG seems to be really, really happy.

interactables.name: LOCK
interactables.description: A triple LOCK on the south door
interactables.inspectDescription: The LOCK is labeled 'ABC'.

interactables.name: LOCK
interactables.description: A triple LOCK on the south door, the first part is already opened
interactables.inspectDescription: The LOCK is labeled 'ABC', the first part is already opened.

interactables.name: LOCK
interactables.description: A triple LOCK on the south door, only the third part remains locked
interactables.inspectDescription: The LOCK is labeled 'ABC', only the third part remains locked.

interactables.name: BAG
interactables.description: A fabric BAG closed with a simple knot

interactables.name: BAG
interactables.description: An opened fabric BAG

interactables.name: PANEL
interactables.description: A small blue PANEL hangs from the wall
interactables.inspectDescription: The PANEL door is closed.

interactables.name: PANEL
interactables.description: A small blue PANEL hangs from the wall
interactables.inspectDescription: The PANEL door is opened.

interactables.name: KEYHOLE
interactables.description: A blue KEYHOLE in the back wall of the PANEL
interactables.inspectDescription: The KEYHOLE seems to be part of some electronic circuitry.

items.name: FLASHLIGHT
items.description: A small led FLASHLIGHT without batteries
items.inspectDescription: The FLASHLIGHT looks brand new but is not working.

items.name: FLASHLIGHT
items.description: A small and powerful led FLASHLIGHT

items.name: WHISKEY
items.inspectDescription: The WHISKEY bottle is still sealed.

items.name: TROPHY
items.inspectDescription: The TROPHY has an unreadable inscription.

items.name: BONE
items.description: A dog toy shaped like a BONE

items.name: BATTERIES
items.inspectDescription: The BATTERIES look brand new and are very shiny.

actions.description: With a bit of force, you open the CABINET doors.

effects.description: You see a KEYCHAIN inside the CABINET.

actions.description: Upon entering the Storage Room, you hear many footsteps outside and the noise of someone being dragged around.
You notice the MAN is now gone.
The MAN sees you swinging the SHOVEL at him and dodges the hit.
You consider stabbing the MAN with the SCREWDRIVER, but then realize you don't want to murder anyone.
You consider stabbing the defenseless MAN with the SCREWDRIVER but choose not to.
The MAN is unconscious, there's no need to hit him with a SHOVEL.
The MAN is unconscious, there is absolutely no reason to stab him with a SCREWDRIVER.
You give the WHISKEY bottle to the MAN. He just takes it and remains standing in front of the door.
You throw a handfull of FLOUR towards the MAN's face.

effects.description: The MAN remains standing but is blinded and trying to clear the FLOUR out of his eyes.

actions.description: You use the SHOVEL to hit the MAN on the head and he falls to the ground. He is not bleeding and seems to still be breathing. Well played.
You hear a voice coming from the Dining Room saying: 'Go to the exit'
There's no one around anymore. Who said those words?
You try to open the CUPBOARD, but the doors just won't move. You may need a more drastic approach about those glass doors.
You swing the TROPHY at the CUPBOARD glass doors and they shatter.
You placed the BATTERIES in the FLASHLIGHT.

effects.description: The flashlight now emits a fairly bright light that will allow you to see in the dark.

actions.description: You open all of the DRAWERS and only find a big PAN and a very small POT.
You pull on the LATCH to open it.
You use the SCREWDRIVER to force the DRAWER open.

effects.description: You can see a small key labeled KEY_A.

actions.description: You placed the KEY_A in the KEYCHAIN.
Slowly, you give the BONE to the big DOG.

effects.description: The DOG stops being angry and moves aside with the BONE in his mouth.

actions.description: You placed the KEY_B in the KEYCHAIN.
You use the KEY_A to open the first part of the triple LOCK.
You use the KEY_B to open the second part of the triple LOCK.
You use the KEY_C to open the final part of the triple LOCK.

effects.description:
As you remove the heavy triple lock from the door, you can hear footsteps on the other side.
You quickly open the door and are blinded by a very bright white light.
While trying to adjust to the extreme lighting, you feel a needle in your neck.
As you fall down to the ground, fainting, you hear a rather high-pitched voice saying:
'THE EXIT IS A LIE'.

...

Well, you finished the game.
It's probably not the ending you expected, but at least you have some closure now.

actions.description: You undo the knot, open the BAG and find some BATTERIES and a dog toy shaped like a BONE inside.
You open the PANEL door and see a blue KEYHOLE in the back wall.
You use the BLUE_KEY on the blue KEYHOLE and hear a loud clicking noise coming from elsewhere.
